title: Software Engineer - Sysco GSC
details: Software development for the Topshelf and BT Specialty Meat and Seafood divisions.

title: Supply Line Engineer - Terdyne de Costa Rica S.R.L
details: Collaborated with contract manufacturing partners to address supplier quality issues, implementing effective containment and corrective actions to maintain customer shipments and product quality. Developed applications to enhance process times and efficiency, while actively contributing to optimizing supplier development strategies to improve operational performance.

title: Supply Line Engineer - Terdyne de Costa Rica S.R.L
details: Coordinated internal processes within the SBM group to ensure smooth operations and timely project delivery. Oversaw process improvement initiatives to boost efficiency and productivity. Successfully migrated Universal Robots’ Bill of Materials (BOM) to Teradyne, ensuring accuracy and completeness. Developed and implemented a comprehensive maintenance plan for the BOM to ensure timely updates and changes.

title: RoHS engineer - Terdyne de Costa Rica S.R.L
details: Managed materials certification documentation, facilitated RoHS product roll-out, and ensured compliance with certification and DFM properties for Teradyne’s approved vendor list.
